sentences.english: As you said, here sure have one remanent chicken leg.
sentences.chinese: 正如你說的一樣，這裏的確還有一隻雞腿沒有喫掉。

sentences.english: Return all of the chicken to the pan.
I had a hamberg and fried chicken leg.
Tom:I'd like two chicken combos and an order of fried chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 我要兩個雞腿漢堡套餐，外加一份炸雞翅。

sentences.english: Chicken strips marinated with basil threaded on a skewer.
sentences.chinese: 雞腿肉在意大利香料中浸泡後用串肉籤串連。

sentences.english: The fried chicken awoke my sweet memory.
sentences.chinese: 這個炸雞腿鉤起了我甜美的印象。

sentences.english: I can't believe you actually have courage to eat New Orleans drumstick for your low salary.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信你確實有膽量喫你的低工資新奧爾良雞腿。

sentences.english: You can either serve the chicken as it is with its thin soy juices, or thicken them with cornflour.
sentences.chinese: 這時候，雞腿肉上薄薄的都是醬汁，就可以上桌了。

sentences.english: Not one chicken leg, peacock neck or armadillo tail was left.
sentences.chinese: 沒有半隻雞腿，孔雀脖子，連犰狳尾巴都沒半根。

sentences.english: Everybody fulfilled, just like the moment of turning around after mooey cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 大家都各自達到目的了，如同喫完雞腿抹嘴轉身一般。

sentences.english: Spicy Chicken Combo and two pineapple pies, please.
sentences.chinese: 一個麥辣雞腿套餐和兩個菠蘿派。

sentences.english: You can pull it from the drumsticks as well, but this is more difficult.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以從雞腿開始起，但這樣會難很多。

sentences.english: Chest meat, he asserted, is too stringy, whereas the drumstick of a young chicken is "delicate and easy to chew."
sentences.chinese: 他認爲雞胸肉太老，而雞腿肉很嫩很好嚼。

sentences.english: Chicken is more populer than fried rice.
Marinated chicken dark meat, grilled and served with spicy and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 精選上等去骨雞腿肉，以獨門醬料醃漬後，上架薰烤。

sentences.english: Don't you know that I hate drumsticks?
sentences.chinese: 難道你就不知道我很討厭喫雞腿嗎？

definition: to work extra hours/to do overtime
plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
